thread.title: Rendering not working can't move doesn't render

post.author: gav89
post.body: Haven't been on it a long time garh great to be back. Any way i'm getting back into editing but I seem to have lost the function to render my level all of a sudden when I try to render(F3) it doesn't render and when i move the camera only moves in the grid view i've tried real time view and tried pushing F7 but no luck.

post.author: Bittoman
post.body: F7 is realtime, F3 resets (turns off realtime rendering). WB

post.author: gav89
post.body: Ty, but nope nothing still in the camera mode and still i can't move in it only the grid

post.author: gav89
post.body:
To put it short and sweet I used to be able to render (well i think i pulled it off once) but now when I push F3 the view freezes nothing gets rendered i'm stuck in editor view but the camera still moves(as I can see it move in the grid view) when i push F3 again to switch it off the camera appears in the new location(if i've moved the camera)

I hope that Help, garh stupid me...

here's my spec

Windows Vista Home Premium

Intel Duo core 2 2.13 Ghz x 2

1022MB Memory(I know strange)

Nvidia 7650 GS 256MB

and just in case here's my target in the shortcut

"C:\Program Files\id Software\Quake 4\Quake4.exe" +r_fullscreen 0 +r_gamma 1 +set r_brightness 1 +set r_multiSamples 0 + set r_smp 0 +set r_mode 3 +editor

I really have no idea, stupid thing only worked about once. look forward for more response
